title: Annual Fund
copy: Your unrestricted, 100% tax-deductible contribution to the Annual Fund is vital—providing critical operating expenses not fully covered by membership dues and admission tickets. Your gift directly supports the excellence, innovation, and inspiration that are at the heart of the Art Institute experience. Every year that includes: Educational programs and resources that reach tens of thousands of families and children in Chicago The care and conservation of over 300,000 works of art More than 30 original and critically acclaimed special exhibitions Groundbreaking scholarship from leading curators, conservators, and scientists Give to the Art Institute of Chicago's Annual Fund   Contact Us For more information, please call (312) 499-4111.
